title: Strengthening Workplace Professionals' Foundational English Skills in Science Through Web-Based English Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary English syntax at the middle school level and recognition of introductory scientific terminology
context.additional_context: A course operated in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, aiming to improve scientific document interpretation and communication skills.

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately apply 50 core scientific English vocabulary terms in context.

Learners analyze three web-based science lab reports from a mobile platform (e.g., PhET simulations), summarize each reportâ€™s core content in approximately 300 characters, and achieve at least 7 out of 9 points (clarity 3, completeness 3, logicality 3) on the evaluation rubric
Through weekly formative assessments, learners compose two science-related English emails and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
